content.raw:
the homebrew build was failing because ignition-rendering had an old commit, but I updated it in [osrf/simulation pr 361](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/361) and after sorting out a build failure in a test (related to a [bug in ign-transport](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/261)), the homebrew build is :yellow_heart: 

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/88/

This PR will make Ignition GUI in Homebrew great again.
